data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Gibraltar.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Gibraltar
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the country of Gibraltar who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Gibraltar.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, give the believers of the the country of Gibraltar unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the country of Gibraltar.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 741 believers in the country of Gibraltar into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 32,859 people in Gibraltar who are far from you. Please add 6 new house churches this year.
Lord, help the people of Gibraltar to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.section_summary:
the country of Gibraltar has a population of 33,600.

We estimate Gibraltar has 741 people who might know Jesus, 26,207 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,652 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 45 neighbors who need Jesus.
